originalText.text: Sigh. I‚Äôve been coming here for over two years and my patience is gone. The machines are old and inconsistent and I struggle to get my clothes as clean as at previous laundromats (tried different detergents, sorting methods, water temps, you name it). The last straw for me came a few weeks ago when I brought in ALL of my winter clothes - wool and acrylic sweaters, winter running clothes, pants, etc. - to freshen them for the season. I put them in a dryer on NO HEAT and stayed until the machine was cool just to be triple sure and then left to get a coffee. Came back 15 mins later to find that someone had switched my dryer to HIGH HEAT and fried my clothes. I have a sweater that feels like a Brillo pad now because synthetic fibers aren‚Äôt made to withstand heat like that. When I asked them about it, the lady said ‚Äúhigh heat is better‚Äù ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è and when I said it messed up my clothes, it was suddenly ‚Äúoh i don‚Äôt know‚Äù.  Giving them two stars because they do keep it clean.

originalText.text: Efficient. I love that they hand us quarters in whatever amount we need.  The people who work here are quick to smile and laugh. Every machine I‚Äôve used works well. They have a lot of security camera displays, lol.

text.text: Efficient. I love that they hand us quarters in whatever amount we need.  The people who work here are quick to smile and laugh. Every machine I‚Äôve used works well. They have a lot of security camera displays, lol.

originalText.text: Walked in at 9, just asked for twenty mins on the dryer and was berated by the owner for using the dryer only and coming in after 8:15 even though it says open til 10pm and had just logged lugged the laundry 8 blocks to get there.

text.text: Walked in at 9, just asked for twenty mins on the dryer and was berated by the owner for using the dryer only and coming in after 8:15 even though it says open til 10pm and had just logged lugged the laundry 8 blocks to get there.

originalText.text: I have laundry room in my building but the machines are not always reliable. And when I come to York launderette with my dog, they are so nice and always very quick with changes and provides the best services. love my neighborhood small businesses!

text.text: I have laundry room in my building but the machines are not always reliable. And when I come to York launderette with my dog, they are so nice and always very quick with changes and provides the best services. love my neighborhood small businesses!

originalText.text:
Beware of closing time. Just because it says 10pm, last call happens around 8:30 ish. I was almost kicked out but the manager was nice enough to let me stay. The lady that followed me over 30 mins later not only showed up late, said she wouldn‚Äôt use the dryer, only to leave and forget her close (came back late) and still ended up using the dryer‚Ä¶

Wash takes a little over 30 minutes to complete. Dryer is $.25 for 6minute I believe. Sometimes the machines a little hiccupy.

Generally a solid place to do laundry (would‚Äôve given a 3 star) rating, but one night a roach came in and no staff did anything about it. They just cleaned/worked around it. I think that was the last time I did laundry there. Lol
